There was more of that roar, and a few footsteps, and all the time,
there was the ubiquitous sound of a clinking chain. Somehow, the thing
would not come out at Quicktrike's demand.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> Quickstrike's eyes darted around the room looking for the beast.
> "Y-you don't scare me.  Come out and show yourself!"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> > A deafening roar answered him, something very bestial and very 
> primal...
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > Quickstrike glanced around neavrous for a second but quickly 
> shook 
> > > it off.
> > > 'Ya can't show weakness or they'll think yer' yellow,'  he 
> thought 
> > > to himself.  He got into a fighting stance with his snake mouth 
> > > opened and ready to fight.
> > > "Alright who's the guy who thinks he's toughter then I am!?"  
> > > Quickstrike demanded to whoever was listening.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> 
> wrote:
> > > > > The room was a hangar, and the lighting was poor. One thing 
> was
> > > > > constant, however, there was a loud clicking sound like a 
> > > chain's from
> > > > > one corner, and also something like a grunting noise...
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" 
> <CatMastero@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > He snatched the datapad and took a quick glance at the 
> number.
> > > > > > "Alright, I'll show ya that there ain't nobody tougher 
> then 
> > > ol' 
> > > > > > Quickstrike." He gloated then turned around and started 
> > > towards the 
> > > > > > room.
> > > > > > "I'll show this guy a think or two," he muttered on his 
> way. 
> > > He 
> > > > > > entered the room to meet his opponet. 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > > Guard 3: Teeheehee! Small bot thinks he can handle us, 
> eh? 
> > > Oh! 
> > > > > > Guys, I
> > > > > > > got an idea.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > The four guards came closer, whispering and laughing, 
> then 
> > > Guard 4
> > > > > > > came nearer.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Guard4: Alright, alright. No joking. You want to get 
> tested 
> > > in? Go 
> > > > > > to
> > > > > > > that room and challenge the one in it.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > He handed Quicktrike a little datapad that had a number 
> on 
> > > it.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" 
> > > <CatMastero@y...> 
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > "Why, I can slag anything that walks, slithers, 
> crawls, 
> > > flies or 
> > > > > > > > swims. Bring on the obstacles an' all knock them 
> down!"  
> > > > > > Quickstrike 
> > > > > > > > said vigorously.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" 
> <gestaltproject@h...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > > Guard 1: Hey, ease off, Dirtcrawler! You gotta prove 
> > > yourself 
> > > > > > > > before
> > > > > > > > > we actually accept you in the Army.
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > Guard 2 (chuckling): Yeah, and it's not just 'cause 
> > > you're a 
> > > > > > cowbot
> > > > > > > > > that you can survive on abattlefield!
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" 
> > > <CatMastero@y...> 
> > > > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > > > "Well,  looks like they got alot of buggers down 
> > > here.  I 
> > > > > > ganer 
> > > > > > > > if 
> > > > > > > > > > they have a pub,"  He commented as his snake head 
> on 
> > > the end 
> > > > > > of 
> > > > > > > > his 
> > > > > > > > > > tail glanced around.
> > > > > > > > > > "Quickstrike terrorize!"  He converted back to his 
> > > robot 
> > > > > > form.
> > > > > > > > > > "So you guys got a sign up form for kickin' 
> butt?"  He 
> > > asked 
> > > > > > the 
> > > > > > > > > > four guards.

> tunnel.

> > > > > > armed 
> > > > > > > > > > guards
> > > > > > > > > > > watched over the passage. Civilians roamed 
> > > everywhere, 
> > > > > > > > bringing 
> > > > > > > > > > goods
> > > > > > > > > > > and materials to the base, and packing small 
> > > freighters in 
> > > > > > the
> > > > > > > > > > > shipping docks.

> > > > > > hatch.

> > > > > > > > > > > > > behaving. Please proceed.

> when

> > > > > > > > > > large 
> > > > > > > > > > > > the 
> > > > > > > > > > > > > > guns are.'Now these are by kinda people 
> > > alright'.
> > > > > > > > > > > > > > "Why I'm Quickstrike.  The toughest bot 
> > > around.  I 
> > > > > > saw 
> > > > > > > > > > lookin' 
> > > > > > > > > > > > to 
> > > > > > > > > > > > > > see if ya had an opening."

> > > first

> > > > > > > > > > > > > > > or defiance. The only thing was that the

> > > > > > > > > > > > > > > >  snake head as if it were someone else.

> > > > > > said to

> > > > > > > > > > > > as 
> > > > > > > > > > > > > > he 
> > > > > > > > > > > > > > > >  walked up to the iron doors of their
